features.description: Verify that tasks can be pulled from orchestrator to local queue
features.title: Test orchestrator sync integration
evidence: Sync test successful - task pulled from orchestrator

features.description: Add visual warning indicators to the license dashboard showing licenses expiring within 30 days. Display warning badge (amber) for licenses expiring in 15-30 days, urgent badge (red) for licenses expiring in <15 days. Include expiration date and days remaining in tooltip. HIPAA: License data is PHI - ensure no logging, proper test coverage >80%.
features.error:
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable required.
OAuth tokens from Claude.ai (sk-ant-oat01-...) do NOT work with the API.
Get an API key from: https://console.anthropic.com/api-keys
features.title: Add license expiration warning badges to dashboard
acceptance_criteria: Warning badge (amber) appears on licenses expiring in 15-30 days
Urgent badge (red) appears on licenses expiring in <15 days
Tooltip shows 'Expires in X days' on hover
No PHI logged to console or error tracking
features.hipaa_notes: License expiration dates are PHI. Ensure proper handling: no console.log, encrypted API calls, audit trail for data access.
